DataElement.preferredName: First Accelerated Phase of Disease Occurrence Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year the first accelerated phase of disease occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: First Accelerated Phase of Disease Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree._The phase of a disease characterized by laboratory and clinical findings that indicate rapid progression._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.
